subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador closed in on his second Giro d’Italia title, comfortably keeping his lead during a next-to-last stage won by Vasili Kiryienka after a solo breakaway.
snippet: Alberto Contador closed in on his second Giro d’Italia title, comfortably keeping his lead during a next-to-last stage won by Vasili Kiryienka after a solo breakaway.
